summary: Add metadata.messageType field to protobuf payloads in PHP SDK to match Java and Go SDK implementations. This requires accessing the protobuf message's full name/type information.
userImpact: Users can include message type metadata in protobuf payloads for better interoperability and debugging across Temporal SDKs.
rootCause: PHP Protobuf library's DescriptorPool API not initially discoverable for accessing message full names.
resolutionDetails: Solution provided in comment showing how to access message type using Google Protobuf's DescriptorPool API.
keyQuote: To get message type you can use the following: $pool = \Google\Protobuf\Internal\DescriptorPool::getGeneratedPool(); $pool->getDescriptorByClassName($value::class)->getFullName();
